H0.text: In a dry area is where a plant needs to be placed to stay alive indoors.

H1.text: In a dark room is where a plant needs to be placed to stay alive indoors.

H2.text: The plant needs to be placed on a plant stand to stay alive indoors.

H3.text: Near a sunny place is where a plant needs to be placed for it to stay alive indoors.

A4.text: houseplants from tropical areas are understory plants, and because they grow in shady conditions naturally, they are often able to thrive in lower-light conditions

A5.text: Most houseplants are species that have adapted to survive in a temperature range between 15 and 25 °C (59 and 77 °F) year-round
